DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the bacteria, fungi, and viruses that are present in the sinuses of patients with chronic rhinosinusitis to patients without sinus disease using a new technology, called a microarray, that will allow more accurate identification of microorganisms than current laboratory methods.
DOC.brief_title: Microarray Analysis of Sinus Samples From Patients With and Without Chronic Rhinosinusitis.
DOC.criteria: Age 18 years or older History of chronic rhinosinusitis (CRS) Impaired CRSspecific quality of life Evidence of sinus disease on a CT scan Control patients with any evidence of CRS by history, survey, or imaging criteria
